name: Firebusters (Kristofer Stevenson)
description:
Firebusters is an educational prototype. It aims to teach the players basic knowledge about fire safety when working in an office environment. 

Firebusters was developed by:

Steven Benson, jkelly, KLewis, Kristofer Stevenson

Minimum system requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GT 640 or better

HDD: 200 MB free space

RAM: 4 GB

VRAM: 2 GB
